title: Bakacast #264 – Is That Horse Street Legal?
content:
iTunes  | Direct Download | RSS 
 
As if the Durarara police ever accomplish anything. 
 
Well, this week was...suboptimal. Durarara and Flag continue to be solid, but Arslan, Ushio, Gatchaman and God Eater all ended up being disappointing in some form or another. To be fair to Arslan, though, at least it ain't Gatchaman. 
 
Also, if you haven't done so already, vote in our poll to decide our next retro review . 
 
Please email listener questions to bakacast[at]projectharuhi.net or leave them in the comments below. 
 
Time Index 
  03:30 - The Heroic Legend of Arslan 21  10:21 - Ushio to Tora 9  13:59 - Shimoneta 9  17:54 - Durarara S2 21  22:16 - Gatchaman Crowds Insight 8 (PSEUDO-DROPPED)  27:55 - Akagami no Shirayukihime 9  33:31 - God Eater 6  39:41 - Flag 11 & 12  53:49 - Sins of the Fater (Donna Burke | Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain)
